title: The Big Book of Big Little Books
description: In the '30s and '40s a new breed of comic book hit the stands--the wonderfully chunky little picture books known as BIG LITTLE BOOKS, now valuable collectors items. This collection of BIG LITTLE BOOKS reproduces jacket art and illustrations from all the classics and tells the history of their most sensational stars, including Dick Tracy, Mickey Mouse, and more. Over 200 full-color images .
author: Bill Borden
